install: curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_24.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs docker.io docker-compose && (cd /workspace/api && npm install 2>/dev/null || echo 'API npm install failed') && (cd /workspace/webapp && npm install 2>/dev/null || echo 'Webapp npm install failed') && (cd /workspace/bot && npm install 2>/dev/null || echo 'Bot npm install failed')
start: cd /workspace/docker && docker-compose up -d postgres redis && sleep 10 && docker-compose exec -T postgres pg_isready -U platform_user -d platform_db && docker-compose exec -T redis redis-cli ping

terminals.name: Database Management
terminals.command: cd /workspace/docker && docker-compose exec postgres psql -U platform_user -d platform_db
